successes.title: BLAZAR: Aluminum Bluetooth Speaker & Artist Collaboration
successes.description: A New Universe of Sound. The Ultimate Bluetooth Speaker With Dual Stereo Pairing. Featuring limited edition artist collaborations.

Pledges.description:
It might seem like a small donation, but not to us. Every pledge helps us meet our goal. You will be included in product updates as well as having your name included on our online thank you page, as well as in the liner notes of our retail packaging. 
Thanks for the support!
Exclusive Beacon "Music Has A Higher Purpose" t-shirt. Printed with metallic ink on an amazingly soft and fitted cotton / poly blend body. Made in the USA. Also receive the $5 pledge items.
AWOLNATION X Beacon Audio Limited Edition Collaboration t-shirt.
Receive the AWOLNATION lyric t-shirt. Beautifully designed graphic with one of our favorite lyrics. ONLY available on Kickstarter. Also receive the $5 pledge items.
Halestorm X Beacon Audio Limited Edition Collaboration t-shirt.
Receive the Halestorm lyric t-shirt. Beautifully designed graphic with one of our favorite lyrics. ONLY available on Kickstarter. Also receive the $5 pledge items.
Updated: International Shipping Now Available. Halestorm X Beacon Audio Limited Edition Collaboration t-shirt.
Receive the Halestorm lyric t-shirt. Beautifully designed graphic with one of our favorite lyrics. ONLY available on Kickstarter. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Neon Trees X Beacon Audio Limited Edition Collaboration t-shirt. Receive the Neon Trees lyric t-shirt. Beautifully designed graphic with one of our favorite lyrics. ONLY available on Kickstarter. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL. Get the Blazar in Silver Aluminum before the rest of the world. 
Not only will you get the Blazar at a mind-melting price, it will be shipped to you before anyone else in the world gets their hands on one. Also receive the $5 pledge items.
EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL. Get the Blazar in Deep Graphite before the rest of the world. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

INTERNATIONAL EARLY-BIRD OF MYSTERY. You asked, we delivered. Get the Blazar in Deep Graphite before the rest of the world with FREE global shipping. Not only will you get the Blazar at the exclusive price of $99, it will be shipped to you before anyone else gets their hands on one. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

INTERNATIONAL EARLY-BIRD OF MYSTERY. You asked, we delivered. Get the Blazar in Silver Aluminum before the rest of the world with FREE global shipping. Not only will you get the Blazar at the exclusive price of $99, it will be shipped to you before anyone else gets their hands on one. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

EXTRA EARLY-BIRD DEEP GRAPHITE: We had no idea our early birds would fly so fast! We have added more units of the Blazar in Deep Graphite to satisfy demand. When these are gone, the $134 incentives will still be available. Also receive the $5 pledge items.
Get the Blazar in Silver Aluminum and never look back. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Alliance Appreciation Pricing: Single AWOLNATION ltd Blazar / Case. Because the NATION enabled us to blow past our original goal we want to say THANK YOU by offering a limited number of AWOLNATION Blazar and case packages at an unbeatable price. Spread the word, but get yours before they're gone!

Alliance Appreciation Pricing: Single Brantley Gilbert ltd Blazar / Case. Because the BG NATION enabled us to blow past our original goal we want to say THANK YOU by offering a limited number of Brantley Gilbert Blazar and case packages at an unbeatable price. Spread the word, but get yours before they're gone!

Alliance Appreciation Pricing: Single Halestorm ltd Blazar / Case. Because the Freaks enabled us to blow past our original goal we want to say THANK YOU by offering a limited number of Halestorm Blazar and case packages at an unbeatable price. Spread the word, but get yours before they're gone!

Alliance Appreciation Pricing: Single Neon Trees ltd Blazar / Case. Because the Neon Trees diehards enabled us to blow past our original goal we want to say THANK YOU by offering a limited number of Neon Trees Blazar and case packages at an unbeatable pledge level. Spread the word, but get yours before they're gone!
Get the Blazar in Deep Graphite and enjoy the music. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: AWOLNATION X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed with Aaron Bruno and AWOLNATION. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how a true music fan listens. 
Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: Halestorm X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed with Lzzy Hale and Halestorm. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how a true music fan listens. 
Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: Neon Trees X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed with Tyler Glenn and Neon Trees. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how a true music fan listens. 
Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: AWOLNATION X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed with Aaron Bruno and AWOLNATION. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how a true music fan listens. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: Halestorm X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed with Lzzy Hale and Halestorm. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how a true music fan listens. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: Neon Trees X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed with Tyler Glenn and Neon Trees. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how a true music fan listens. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

Kickstarter Exclusive: Brantley Gilbert X Beacon Audio. Get the limited edition Blazar collaboration designed by Brantley Gilbert. These are limited, numbered and only available on Kickstarter. Show your friends how the BG Nation listens. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

NEON TREES BLAZAR + TEE: Our backers asked for it and now it's available! This Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE includes a Neon Trees limited edition Blazar speaker designed by Tyler Glenn and lyric t-shirt. This combo screams "Keep cool, stay young... I'm just havin my fun."

AWOLNATION BLAZAR + TEE: Listen up NATION! This Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE includes an AWOLNATION limited edition Blazar speaker designed by Aaron Bruno and lyric t-shirt. This combo says "Maybe I'm a different breed..."

HALESTORM BLAZAR + TEE: Ready to freak out? This Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE includes a Halestorm limited edition Blazar speaker designed by Lzzy Hale and Joe Hottinger, and a lyric t-shirt. This package "goes out to anyone whose heart beats like a kick drum!"

EARLY BIRD DUAL-STEREO PAIRING SET. Get a PAIR of amazing, wireless Blazar speakers in Deep Graphite. You will receive yours before anyone else can get their hands on them. Get one for a friend and connect them together, OR, get 2 for yourself and enjoy the good life. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

EARLY BIRD DUAL-STEREO PAIRING SET. Get a PAIR of amazing, wireless Blazar speakers in Silver Aluminum. You will receive yours before anyone else can get their hands on them. Get one for a friend and connect them together, OR, get 2 for yourself and enjoy the good life. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

EXTRA EARLY BIRD DEEP GRAPHITE PAIR: Get a PAIR of amazing, wireless Blazar speakers in Deep Graphite. You will receive yours before anyone else can get their hands on them. Get one for a friend and connect them together, OR, get 2 for yourself and enjoy the good life. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

EXTRA EARLY BIRD SILVER ALUMINUM PAIR: Get a PAIR of amazing, wireless Blazar speakers in Silver Aluminum. You will receive yours before anyone else can get their hands on them. Get one for a friend and connect them together, OR, get 2 for yourself and enjoy the good life. Also receive the $5 pledge items.

ULTIMATE DEEP GRAPHITE PAIR: Get a PAIR of amazing, wireless Blazar speakers in Deep Graphite. Get one for a friend and connect them together, OR, get 2 for yourself and enjoy the good life. Also receive the $5 pledge items. $80 savings from the future retail price of $299.

Alliance Appreciation Pricing - Double Threat Edition: Pair of AWOLNATION  ltd Blazar Speakers / Case. We still can't believe the response from the entire AWOLNATION that pushed us past our goal so quickly. To say THANK YOU we're offering a limited number of Dual Speaker Packs of the AWOLNATION Blazar and case at an unbeatable pledge level.

Alliance Appreciation Pricing - Double Threat Edition: Pair of Brantley Gilbert ltd Blazar Speakers / Case. We still can't believe the response from the BG Nation that pushed us past our goal so quickly. To say THANK YOU we're offering a limited number of Dual Speaker Packs of the BG Blazar and case at an unbeatable pledge level.

Alliance Appreciation Pricing - Double Threat Edition: Pair of Halestorm ltd Blazar Speakers / Case. We still can't believe the response from all the Freaks that pushed us past our goal so quickly. To say THANK YOU we're offering a limited number of Dual Speaker Packs of the Halestorm Blazar and case at an unbeatable pledge level.

Alliance Appreciation Pricing - Double Threat Edition: Pair of Neon Trees ltd Blazar Speakers / Case. We still can't believe the response from all the NT diehards that pushed us past our goal so quickly. To say THANK YOU we're offering a limited number of Dual Speaker Packs of the Neon Trees Blazar and case at an unbeatable pledge level.

AWOLNATION | PREMIUM PAIR + TEE: The NATION has spoken and we've answered! This Kickstarter exclusive includes a PAIR of AWOLNATION limited edition Blazar speakers designed by Aaron Bruno. To really push it over the edge, we are including the AWOL lyric t-shirt as well. This is our way of saying "Thank you for listening again…or for the first time!"

HALESTORM | PREMIUM PAIR + TEE: The Freaks have screamed and we've answered back with this screaming deal. This Kickstarter exclusive includes a PAIR of Halestorm limited edition Blazar speakers designed by Lzzy Hale and Joe Hottinger. Also includes the Halestorm lyric t-shirt. Halestorm fanatics, "Let's toast, cause things got better!"

NEON TREES PREMIUM PAIR + TEE: You told us what you wanted and now we're giving it to you! This Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE includes a PAIR of Neon Trees LTD Blazar speakers designed by Tyler Glenn and lyric t-shirt. When the neighbors ask you can say "We're making all the noise!"

Brantley Gilbert VIP Concert Experience: Brantley is giving you 2 BG Blazar Speakers, 2 BG merch t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Brantley at any show until the end of 2014.

EXTRA: Brantley Gilbert VIP Concert Experience. BECAUSE OF HIGH DEMAND, We have added additional BG meet & greet incentives. Brantley is offering 2 BG Blazar Speakers, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Brantley at any show until the end of 2014.

LZZY HALE PERSONALIZED GREETING. Give the ultimate gift this Holiday - receive a pair of Halestorm Blazar speakers, a lyric t-shirt, AND a personalized holiday greeting from Lzzy. Great keepsake for yourself, or as a gift for a friend or family member. You let us know who the greeting is going to and Lzzy will personally make this a holiday season they'll never forget. Greeting will be delivered digitally.

Halestorm VIP Concert Experience: This package is every Freak's dream - 2 Halestorm Blazar Speakers, 2 lyric t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Lzzy and the band at any show until the end of 2014.

Neon Trees VIP Concert Experience: It doesn't get any better than this! 2 NT Blazar Speakers, 2 lyric t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Tyler and the band and the band at any show during their 2014 tour.

Be an AWOLNATION VIP at X-Fest, Calgary: This package will make you go AWOL! 2 AWOLNATION Blazar Speakers, 2 lyric t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Aaron and the band on August 31st in Calgary, Alberta at X-Fest. **Travel not included **

Be an AWOLNATION VIP in Vegas: This is an AWOLNATION Special Engagement Package - 2 Blazar Speakers, 2 lyric t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Aaron and the band on September 20th in Las Vegas. **You must be 21 years old to pledge toward this incentive** **Travel not included **

Be an AWOLNATION VIP at Riotfest, CO: Go AWOL at Riotfest! Get 2 Blazar Speakers, 2 lyric t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Aaron and the band on September 22nd in Denver, CO at this year's Riotfest. **Travel not included **

Be an AWOLNATION VIP at Buzz Beach Ball, MO: Go AWOL with 2 Blazar Speakers, 2 lyric t-shirts, AND 2 tickets that include Meet & Greet passes to meet Aaron and the band on September 27th in Kansas City, MO at Buzz Beach Ball 2013. **Travel not included **
